name: PokemonApp
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.build:ios: cd platforms/ios && xcodebuild -workspace PokemonApp.xcworkspace -scheme PokemonApp -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16 Plus' build
scripts.run:ios: npm run build:ios && npm run install:ios && npm run launch:ios

author: Sacha Duvivier
